title: League Keeps Freezing
body:
Hello guys. I recently purchased a new gaming laptop but League keeps freezing every other game. My only option is to hard reboot or use task manager. 

My drivers are up to date. 
I monitored my temp 70Â° C for both my GPU and CPU
I tried unistalling League to have it run on my SSD and HDD
Disabling Xbox DVR 

My specs:
i7-6700 HQ
Gtx 1060 6gb
16gb Ram 

Everyother game runs smoothly (Overwatch/Fallout) so I dont believe its a hardware issue. 
Any tips/advice will ne greatly appreciated since Ive had this problem for weeks :(
Also I get 100-140 fps on medium high. Is this normal?

replies.body: Grats on your new rig!  Make sure that your OS is up to date as well.  If you're also on Windows 10, you might have the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) auto-enabled, which has been known to cause freezing for some players.  Disable that, and test it in a custom game to let me know if that did the trick!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qH63TBQE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-05T16:19:48.089+0000)
>
> Grats on your new rig!  Make sure that your OS is up to date as well.  If you're also on Windows 10, you might have the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) auto-enabled, which has been known to cause freezing for some players.  Disable that, and test it in a custom game to let me know if that did the trick!

I did and unfortunately that did not do the trick. My frames drop from 140 to 90. I wouldnt expect to have that on these specs so I dont know if its a possibility my computer is running League poorly?

There could be a variety of different reason, even bad game files.  Make sure to go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide just to rule out some possibilities. 

If the issue continues, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will take a look and work directly with you.  See you there!
